name: Messari
title: Markus Levin on XYO's Proof-of-Origin Technology on Fully Diluted with Messari Research
text:
Synopsis
XYO has developed a proof-of-origin technology that enables verifiable data collection and tracking across multiple stages, leveraging blockchain and IoT technologies to validate the source and transmission of data points.

Key Insights
- XYO's technology allows for proof-of-location and data collection through various IoT sensors
- The platform can collect diverse data types, including:
  - Temperature sensor readings
  - On-demand data like store opening hours
  - Real-time environmental information
- Proof-of-origin technology tracks data points through multiple stages:
  - Initial generation at sensor level
  - Handover to IPFS database
  - Transfer to smart contract
- Data is "tangled" at each handover point to ensure verifiable origin and endpoint tracking
- The technology provides a method to validate and verify the source and transmission path of data
